metadata.title: Puget Sound POM Model

creators.name: University of Washington (UW), School of Oceanography

metadata.description: The model provides daily hindcasts of the circulation, temperature and salinity in Puget Sound. These hindcases are calculated using calculated tides, atmospheric forcing from the UW Atmospheric MM5 model and river forcing from real-time data sensors from the USGS.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To provide daily hindcasts of the circulation, temperature and salinity in Puget Sound to researchers.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Unknown
